dimensions: a: Warp: 81 cm (32 in.). Weft: 137.5 cm (54 1/4 in.) (Width is one selvedge to selvedge and one incomplete piece.) b: Warp: 67 cm (27 1/2 in.). Weft: 121 cm (47 1/2 in.) (width is one selvedge to selvedge and one incomplete piece.) Pattern: height of repeat not present. Textile designed so that when selvedge to selvedge widths sewn together design forms a straight repeat.
title: A la gloire de Louis XVI
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Component "b" is embellished with embroidery in satin stitch (woman's cap and fleur de lys) and stem stitch (netlike covering over globe).
description: Design of four framed allegorical scenes, separated by swags, floral garlands and cornucopias. Red on white.
name: Textile
